title: Windows 10 build 19044.1620 is out with an actual new feature
content:
We’re at that halfway point between Patch Tuesdays, and that means it’s time for the ‘C’ and ‘D’ week updates for Windows 10 and 11. Today, Windows 10 is getting its optional update, and as usual, it’s available for versions 20H2, 21H1, and 21H2. Interestingly, this one actually comes with a new feature, a rarity

The post Windows 10 build 19044.1620 is out with an actual new feature appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is releasing a new optional update for Windows 10, and it includes a new feature called Search Highlights, along with fixes.
